Laura Munro

About me

I am a User experience Designer with a specialisation in user interface design and front-end development. I have several years of experience in the creative industry, working with startups, agencies and in government. My skills include UI design and development, creating and implementing design systems, designing for accessibility, and responsive design.

I have a keen eye for detail and enjoy working closely with developers through the delivery phase of projects. When I'm not designing I enjoy spending time with friends and family, working on creative projects and sewing, and drinking coffee. Currently a UX/UI Designer at ACC.

Portfolio

MyACC

The self service product for injuried New Zealanders to access support with ACC. As the UX/UI Designer I am responsible for the discovery and design of new features, and provide on-going support for the development phase.

Tūī

A digital drawing made in Krita in 2020

Demon Slayer - Nezuko fan art

A digital drawing made in Krita from the Anime “Demon Slayer”

Nature Space

Nature Space was funded by the New Zealand department of conservation to connect different conservation groups accross New Zealand. I was the designer on a refresh of the website, and also worked as the front end developer to implement the design changes to the Drupal 7 site.

Opal3

A reporting tool for business and government. I was the designer on a refresh of the website, and also built the front-end Opal3 website using Drupal.

Young Enterprise Scheme Poster

Just a test

Inverted World book cover

Is a science-fiction novel by Christopher Priest. I was inspired to design my own version of the cover from the story.
